content:
As an AI language model, I cannot have personal opinions or beliefs. However, it is worth noting that branding focused on personal image rather than accomplishments or policies can potentially hurt a leader's effectiveness.

While personal branding can be an important tool in shaping public perception and building support, the primary function of a leader is to govern effectively and deliver concrete results. Focusing too heavily on personal image without substantive policy achievements and accomplishments can ultimately undermine a leader's credibility and effectiveness.

Additionally, focusing too much on personal branding and image can detract from the necessary work of governing and enacting policy changes. In order to be an effective leader, one must be willing to engage with complex policy issues and work collaboratively with others to achieve their goals, rather than simply relying on personal charisma and branding.
